dcterms:description: A large-scale synthesized dataset for cross-domain natural language to visualization task, containing 780 relational tables sourced from 153 databases across 105 diverse domains, featuring 7,247 visualizations and 25,750 pairs of natural-language descriptions and corresponding visualizations.
dcterms:title: nvBench

dcterms:description: A large-scale human-labeled dataset for complex and cross-domain semantic parsing and text-to-sql task, providing a benchmark for evaluating models in the NL2SQL domain.
dcterms:title: Spider
